医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
解锁医用毛毛虫血淋巴的凝血机制血液是一种非凡的物质：它必须在血管内保持液态，但在血管外尽快凝结以止血。对于脊椎动物的血液来说，使这成为可能的化学级联是众所周知的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240330/Unlocking-clotting-mechanisms-in-caterpillar-hemolymph-for-medical-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240330/Unlocking-clotting-mechanisms-in-caterpillar-hemolymph-for-medical-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d3c19ed-7cdf-4d14-a6b1-d174895592cc Sat, 30 Mar 2024 00:13:00 -0400 Unlocking clotting mechanisms in caterpillar hemolymph for medical use
创新工具可以保护癌症患者免受化疗引起的肾脏损害布里格姆研究人员和合作者利用来自美国六个主要癌症中心的患者数据，开发了一种在接受化疗药物顺铂后中度至重度肾损伤的风险预测模型，这是同类中规模最大、首个可推广的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240330/Innovative-tool-could-safeguard-cancer-患者-from-chemotherapy-induced-kidney-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240330/Innovative-tool-could-safeguard-cancer-患者-from-chemotherapy-induced-kidney-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d798465-f481-4326-abd6-7f2b44736fc2 Sat, 30 Mar 2024 00:04:00 -0400 Innovative tool could safeguard cancer patients from chemotherapy-induced kidney damage
研究探讨导致宫颈癌筛查城乡差异的因素研究表明，英语水平、收入和地区失业率是影响因素之一，并强调需要采取量身定制的干预措施来提高筛查率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240330/Study-explores-factors-contributing-to-rural-urban-difference-in-cervical-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240330/Study-explores-factors-contributing-to-rural-urban-difference-in-cervical-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86cfc249-5a1c-415b-abba-dc128b367db5 Sat, 30 Mar 2024 00:00:00 -0400 Study explores factors contributing to rural-urban difference in cervical cancer screening
新研究测试新型迷幻化合物作为酒精使用障碍的潜在治疗方法现代心理健康公司 Clerkenwell Health 今天宣布，它正在与临床阶段生物技术公司 Beckley Psytech 合作开展一项 IIa 期研究，调查一种新型迷幻化合物与心理支持相结合是否可以有效治疗酒精使用障碍 (AUD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/New-study-to-test-novel-psychedelic-compound-as-潜在-治疗-for-alcohol-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/New-study-to-test-novel-psychedelic-compound-as-潜在-治疗-for-alcohol-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=664fab13-a29e-4c1d-b786-7b8c3ae426e5 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 23:53:00 -0400 New study to test novel psychedelic compound as potential treatment for alcohol use disorder
研究发现，社交媒体上分享的避孕内容大部分不是来自健康专家布里格姆研究人员查看了 2014 年至 2019 年有关避孕方法的推文，发现只有一小部分是由卫生专业人员撰写的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Contraceptive-content-shared-on-social-media-largely-not-from-health-experts-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Contraceptive-content-shared-on-social-media-largely-not-from-health-experts-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d0574d4-9ab3-43d7-97bf-162806787ed0 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Contraceptive content shared on social media largely not from health experts, study finds
对细菌中气体囊泡聚集的新见解为生物医学应用打开了大门气体囊泡是由某些微生物细胞中的蛋白质制成的中空结构，莱斯大学的研究人员相信它们可以被编程用于生物医学应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/New-insights-into-gas-vesicle-clustering-in-bacteria-open-doors-for-biomedical-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/New-insights-into-gas-vesicle-clustering-in-bacteria-open-doors-for-biomedical-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc4c8005-7b0f-4a0b-a005-f7714a0eb4f9 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 15:53:00 -0400 New insights into gas vesicle clustering in bacteria open doors for biomedical applications
皮肤胶带取样揭示新生儿食物过敏的早期迹象食物过敏经常发生在儿童时期，并且可能很严重甚至致命。国家犹太健康中心的研究人员正在努力制定一项预防食物过敏的计划，现已确定了该疾病的早期预测因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Skin-tape-sampling-reveals-early-signs-of-food-allergies-in-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Skin-tape-sampling-reveals-early-signs-of-food-allergies-in-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=623ac302-e21d-486e-954b-7f6e233a7930 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 13:36:00 -0400 Skin tape sampling reveals early signs of food allergies in newborns
研究揭示阿尔茨海默病和唐氏综合症的蛋白质结构相似性唐氏综合症是人类最常见的染色体疾病，也是智力障碍最常见的遗传原因，超过 90% 的患者在 55-60 岁时被诊断患有阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Study-reveals- Protein-struct-similarities-in-Alzheimers-and-Down-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Study-reveals- Protein-struct-similarities-in-Alzheimers-and-Down-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65eebc72-0041-454c-8a7c-27b1aa6dd196 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 12:59:00 -0400 Study reveals protein structure similarities in Alzheimer's and Down syndrome
退伍军人研究揭示了患有克兰费尔特综合征和雅各布斯综合征的男性面临的医疗挑战科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的研究人员和全国各地的合作者利用大量退伍军人数据集，对美国拥有额外 X 或 Y 染色体的男性进行了规模最大、最多样化的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Veteran-study-reveals-medical-challenges-in-men-with-Klinefelter-and-Jacobs-syndromes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Veteran-study-reveals-medical-challenges-in-men-with-Klinefelter-and-Jacobs-syndromes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d848136f-c40d-4c8e-80f7-9b6061f61d28 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 12:50:00 -0400 Veteran study reveals medical challenges in men with Klinefelter and Jacobs syndromes
动物研究中有望减少酒精依赖的新化合物斯克里普斯研究中心的科学家在动物研究中发现，LY2444296——一种选择性阻断 kappa 阿片受体 (KOP) 的化合物——可以减少酒精依赖病例的饮酒量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Promising-new-compound-reduces-alcohol-dependence-in-animal-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Promising-new-compound-reduces-alcohol-dependence-in-animal-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2bb2476-9204-4cf9-bc55-5876decd9d48 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 12:43:00 -0400 Promising new compound reduces alcohol dependence in animal studies
